original_text: This is what the Lord says: By this you will know that I am the Lord: With the staff that is in my hand I will strike the water of the Nile, and it will be changed into blood.
korean_text: 여호와가 이같이 이르노니 네가 이로 말미암아 나를 여호와인 줄 알리라 볼지어다 내가 내 손의 지팡이로 나일 강을 치면 그것이 피로 변하고

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
With the staff that is in my hand
I will strike the water of the Nile,
and it will be changed into blood.
